site_name: Sklpc Community Centre And Sports Ground
description: Details of materials and finishes pursuant to condition 3 of planning permission ref: 181446FUL dated 21/07/2021 for: Demolition of all existing buildings on the site; retention and enhancement of existing outdoor sports grass cricket pitch and creation of new outdoor grass pitch; floodlighting and permeable hard landscaping; erection of a new community sports building (providing supporting facilities to the outdoor sports pitches including changing rooms, kitchens, spectator seating and viewing areas approx 5436m2) including indoor multi-use sports halls and gym, multi-use meeting/function rooms; cafe; erection of detached single storey groundskeeper's residence; associated landscaping; car parking; creation of new pedestrian, cycling and vehicular access (including a new vehicular access onto West End Road); and associated drainage and infrastructure works
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
